segments.lesson_summary: Summary of segment 2: In math, we will be learning about addition and subtraction with one-digit numbers, using the properties of commutativity, associativity, and distributivity. We will also practice adding and subtracting, multiplying and dividing, as well as working with multiples and factors. Understanding the concept of division within the hundreds place and dealing with remainders will be part of our lessons. Additionally, we will explore multiplication with single-digit numbers, learning the order of operations, and using parentheses. By the end of this unit, you will be able to solve two-step problems and answer additional math questions confidently. Get ready to enhance your math skills and have fun with numbers!
